summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.0°C) and outside temperature (down 4.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 727 m), and light levels (up 5975 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1674 m), and light levels (up 7904 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 727.1m lower than yesterday, 645.3m lower than the past week, 1674.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 1059m minimum and 3380m maximum, with an average of 997.2m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1642.4m and 2670m.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Drizzle or light rain possible, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and some sunny spells will occur. Weather could become unsettled.
